articles.summary: $2.9 billion was withdrawn from digital asset investment products in a single week. This is the largest weekly outflow ever recorded. It's the third consecutive week of withdrawals in a row for the digital asset market.      Â

articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Cronos wants to reissue 70 billion previously burned CRO tokens (worth $6.3 billion) into a locked reserve. The proposal has drawn a lot of attention.       - CRO token is worth $6 billion.

articles.title: ADA Rockets 60%, XRP Up 25% on Trump's Reserve Plans, But Traders Aren't Fully Bullish Yet
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump wants to establish a national strategic reserve of solana (SOL), cardano (ADA) and XRP (XRP). The assets rose 60% on Sunday, but traders express caution until Trump's plans are more clear.

articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: President Donald Trump has announced the creation of a 'Crypto Strategic Reserve' that will be funded by a new reserve.       - The Reserve will be based on the Bitcoin currency. It will have a reserve fund of $100 billion.

articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Core Scientific names former Morgan Stanley banker as new CFO after bankruptcy exit. Bitcoin (BTC) is up 1.5% on the news. Core Scientific is a company that makes products based on Bitcoin. Bitcoin is traded on the Bitcointalk exchange.

articles.title: The crypto president has some ideas for your tax dollars
articles.author: system
articles.summary: President Donald Trump will address the nation from Capitol Hill on Tuesday. He will talk about his proposal to create a strategic reserve of cryptocurrency. It was unveiled Sunday in a pair of social media posts more than an hour apart. It's a plan that will make the US the "Crypto Capital of the World".

articles.title: Trump proposal to create 'crypto strategic reserve' vexes some industry supporters
articles.author: NBC News
articles.summary: Donald Trump wants to create a 'crypto strategic reserve' along the lines of existing U.S. reserves of gold and oil. He is directing his newly created digital assets working group to move forward on creating such a reserve, he said on Sunday.

articles.title: AI Firm CoreWeave Files for IPO, Citing $1.9B in Revenue
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: CoreWeave, an AI firm in close partnership with Core Scientific, filed for an initial public offering (IPO) today. The company is expected to raise $4 billion, with a valuation of more than $35 billion. Core Scientific had seen $1.9 billion in revenue in 2024.

articles.title: Berachain Debunks Alarming 10M BERA Unlock Rumors: APAC Rep Clarifies Token Distribution
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Rumors circulated about a BERA unlock event within the Berachain ecosystem, specifically a hefty 10 million token release. This sparked concerns among the community members and investors.    - BERA is a type of cryptocurrency that is used to store and exchange information.

articles.title: Less is More: XYZVerse Burns 1 Billion Tokens, Supercharging $XYZ's Value
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: In the crypto world, burning tokens permanently removes them from circulation, making the remaining tokens scarcer. With fewer tokens available, each one naturally grows in value, benefiting holders and the market.    in this case, the value of each token increases.

articles.title: Court Adjourns Nigerian Government's $79.5billion Suit Against Binance Company To April
articles.summary: The Federal High Court Abuja has adjourned the $79.5billion lawsuit filed by the Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) against Binance Holdings Ltd. until April 7. The case was scheduled for hearing on Monday before Justice Inyang Ekwo, but the judge went on recess after hearing other matters on the list. FIRS is seeking reliefs, including a declaration that Binance must file income tax returns for 2022 and 2023 and pay a cumulative sum of $2.001 billion in taxes.

articles.title: Better Business Bureau: Financial grooming scams lead to high-dollar losses, according to new BBB report
articles.author: Ella Gorodetzky
articles.summary: Investment scams are the riskiest scam type in 2024 according to the Better Business Bureau. Romance/friendship scams climbed to No. 3 riskiest for the first time since BBB began publishing the report. People ages 65+ reported the highest median dollar loss of all age groups, followed by ages 18-24.
